sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import cardImages from '../Games/MemoryGameImages/imagedata.json' import { selectedCardImage } from '../../redux/actions' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const MemoryGame = () => { const [allImages, setAllImages] = useState(null) const [target, setTarget] = useState(null) const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false) // const [randomImage, setRandomImage] = useState([]) const dispatch = useDispatch() const selectedImage = useSelector(state => state.games.selected_card_images) console.log(selectedImage) const imagesData = cardImages const handLoadImage = () => { return imagesData?.images?.sort((a, b) => 0.5 - Math.random()) } useEffect(() => { handLoadImage() }, []) // console.log(imagesData) const selectedImageId = selectedImage?.map((image) => image.id) const handleImageClick = (img) => { if (selectedImageId.filter(image => image === img.id)) { setVisible(!visible) } // console.log(target, 'click') // } dispatch(selectedCardImage(img)) } return ( <> { imagesData.images.map(img => ( <>
handleImageClick(img)} className={visible ? ' w-20 h-20 opacity-100' : ' w-20 h-20 opacity-0'} src={imagesData.images[0].image} alt="" />
handleImageClick(imagesData.images.find(img => img))} className={visible ? ' w-20 h-20 opacity-100' : ' w-20 h-20 opacity-0'} src={imagesData.images[1].image} alt="" />
)) } ) } export default MemoryGame
